name: label
description: The label of the input element.

name: id
description: The element ID of the input.

name: fileTypes
description: The file types that the input should accept. E.g. 'image/*, .pdf'.

name: multiple
description: Determines if the input should accept multiple files.

name: clearButtonEnabled
description: Determines if the input should have a clear button. Only gets displayed if the input has a value.

name: disabled
description: Determines if the input is disabled.

name: errorMessage
description: The error message to be displayed below the input.

name: fixMessageLine
description: Determines if the message line should be fixed.

name: descriptionMessage
description: The description message to be displayed below the input.

name: requiredMark
description: Determines if a required mark (*) should be displayed next to the label.
